items.title: Rosenior not ready to coach Chelsea vs. Fulham
items.summary: Liam Rosenior chose not to take charge of Chelsea for the first time in Wednesday's Premier League clash against Fulham because of the "difficult time-frame" between his appointment on Tuesday and the game at Craven Cottage.

items.title: Roma chief: Amorim axe has changed Zirkzee plan
items.summary: Roma sporting director Ricky Massara has hinted that a planned move for Joshua Zirkzee may be on the backburner following Ruben Amorim's Manchester United sacking.

items.title: Raphinha double leads Barcelona Super Cup romp
items.summary: Raphinha scored a brace as Barcelona eased into the Spanish Super Cup final with a thumping 5-0 victory over Athletic Club in Saudi Arabia.

items.title: Bellingham: Madrid squad unrest claims 'fabricated'

That said, United‚Äôs dreadfulness made his continuing omission completely unjustifiable, and I‚Äôm sure he‚Äôll now get a chance in the three-man midfield he needs to thrive. If, in a year, he‚Äôs got a young, physical six behind him, the best creator in world football ahead of him, and he‚Äôs still not making it happen, we can wonder if, perhaps, he‚Äôs not quite good enough, despite his strengths. items.title: Ontketende Brentford-spits zet Braziliaans Premier League-record neer
items.summary: Igor Thiago heeft woensdagavond geschiedenis geschreven in de Premier League. De spits van Brentford scoorde twee keer tegen Sunderland en kwam daarmee op zestien competitietreffers dit seizoen. Daarmee is hij de Braziliaan met de meeste doelpunten in √©√©n Premier League-jaargang ooit.

items.title: Clinical Mitoma brings Brighton level at the Etihad!
items.summary: Kaoru Mitoma finds an equaliser for Brighton against Man City!

items.title: Barcelona laat niets heel van Athletic en is finalist Spaanse Super Cup
items.summary: Barcelona heeft zich zeer overtuigend geplaatst voor de finale van de Supercopa de Espa√±a. In de halve finale maakte de ploeg van Hansi Flick in het Saoedische Jeddah gehakt van Athletic Bilbao: 5-0.

items.title: Premier League live updates: Burnley lead Man United in first game under Fletcher
items.summary: Chelsea travel to Fulham, although new manager Liam Rosenior will be in the stands. Plus, interim boss Darren Fletcher leads Man United vs. Burnley.

items.title: VI Live: trainerswissels sorteren nog weinig effect voor Man Utd en Chelsea
items.summary: Woensdagavond staan er weer veel mooie potjes op het programma. Er zijn liefst acht duels in de Premier League, er wordt gevoetbald in de Serie A en Barcelona speelt de halve finale van de Spaanse Supercopa tegen Athletic Bilbao. Volg de duels in de VI Live.

items.title: Marquinhos vreest niet voor PSG-rivaal Marseille: 'Zij maken ons nooit bang'
items.summary: Marquinhos heeft de boel extra op scherp gezet in aanloop naar de finale van de Troph√©e des Champions tegen Marseille. De verdediger van Paris Saint-Germain kan de Franse supercup voor de elfde keer in zijn carri√®re winnen en heeft geen vrees voor de aartsrivaal. 'Marseille maakt ons nooit bang.'

items.title: Haaland makes no mistake from penalty spot!
items.summary: Erling Haaland puts Manchester City ahead against Brighton from the penalty spot.

items.title: FIFA komt met AI-innovatie: 'WK 2026 wordt grootste spektakel ooit'
items.summary: FIFA wil het WK van 2026 het meest technologische eindtoernooi ooit maken. In aanloop naar het toernooi in de Verenigde Staten, Canada en Mexico presenteerde de wereldvoetbalbond samen met technologiepartner Lenovo een reeks AI-innovaties onder de noemer Football AI . De nieuwe toepassingen moeten scheidsrechters ondersteunen, teams helpen bij analyse √©n de fanbeleving vergroten.

items.title: Former England boss Keegan diagnosed with cancer
items.summary: Former England striker and manager Kevin Keegan has been diagnosed with cancer and is receiving treatment.

items.title: Carrick and Solskjaer frontrunners for Man Utd caretaker role
items.summary: Michael Carrick and Ole Gunnar Solskjaer emerge as frontrunners to become Manchester United's caretaker manager until the end of the season.

items.title: Kevin Keegan, former England and Newcastle manager, diagnosed with cancer
items.summary: He was admitted to hospital with abdominal symptoms Keegan, 74, ‚Äògrateful for intervention and ongoing care‚Äô The former England manager Kevin Keegan has been diagnosed with cancer. Keegan, who also played for England, Scunthorpe, Liverpool, Hamburg, Southampton and Newcastle before later managing Newcastle (twice) as well as Fulham, Manchester City and the national side was recently admitted to hospital for evaluation of ongoing abdominal symptoms. items.title: Who is Manchester City debutant Max Alleyne?
items.summary: Manchester City defender Max Alleyne will make his Premier League debut on Wednesday after being named in Pep Guardiola's team to face Brighton.
